channel.title: Phrase in FAQ?
channel.description:
Now, I know Black Mesa is free, but what about this?
As long as you have Steam installed on your computer, Black Mesa will cost you nothing.
Now, what happens if I don't have Steam installed? Steam is a free program, I don't see what they are trying to say here.
Any advice would be helpful.

item.title: Phrase in FAQ?
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Yeah, you’ve read WAY too much into that.

Read full topic

item.title: Phrase in FAQ?
item.dc:creator: adrianfox
item.description:
I think you need a Steam account in order to download Black Mesa. If you don’t have Steam you can’t play Black Mesa.

Read full topic

item.title: Phrase in FAQ?
item.dc:creator: ASHPD
item.description:
shoopdawhoop100:

Now, I know Black Mesa is free, but what about this?

As long as you have Steam installed on your computer, Black Mesa will cost you nothing.

Now, what happens if I don’t have Steam installed?
Steam is a free program, I don’t see what they are
trying to say here.

Any advice would be helpful.

Either way, Black mesa is free. Even if they wanted to charge for it, that’d be illegal. So yeah, BM is free.

Read full topic
